duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct administrative support for giving programs, giving board and volunteer groups, as well provide support for the annual Days of Giving and brick program.
Maintain master spreadsheet for Giannini Society, Dean's Circles, and Parent Leadership Circle (PLC).
Assist with donor mailings, parent events, and stewardship/donor mailings.
Assist with planning and execution of parent events and programs, assist with coordination of on-campus student activities.
Draft emails and letters for renewals, lapsed members, and new acquisitions.
Facilitate design schedules (brochures, postcards) and manage website updates.
Assist with stewardship plan for each new/renewing member and assist with development of giving society newsletters.
Order and manage SWAG items/inventory and track renewal reminder process.
Assist with management of The Associates, UNCSA’s volunteer organization and design process for brochures and postcards.
Assist with visit scheduling, top parent prospects identification, and service plaques management.
Assist with management of the Associates Portal and serve as a resource for the Associates for questions about volunteer opportunities and the Portal.
Assist with fulfillment of Days of Giving donor mailings and after event follow-up.
Assist with annual brick solicitation and coordinate brick fulfillment with vendor.
